question: The "Bohai Sea" is located on the coast of which nation?
explanation: The Bohai Sea is geographically related to China. It is located on the east coast of mainland China. It is enclosed by the four provinces of China. It is an extension of the Yellow Sea, which connects the Bohai Sea through Bohai Strait. It is also known as the Gulf of Bohai. Its location is close to Beijing, the capital city of China, which makes it one of the busiest seaways in the world. It is the centre of Bohai Economic Rim.
